options.answer: This pokemon's an adorable ghost...but its self conscious about it and will end you if you peek under its costume
This pokemon waves its hands wildly in intimidation and warning that if you come closer it will utterly destroy you. Shame cuz it looks so lovable and cute
This pokemon is famously rumored as being a specific by-product of another fairy pokemon's shadow
This pokemon pretends to guide people and Pokémon around by illuminating darkened areas. However, it is sucking away their life energy and leading them to the Ghost World.
